category: Member sport group regulations/Article 1 (basis and name)
contents: Article 1 (Basis and Name) ① These regulations stipulate matters regarding the organization and operation of sports organizations approved for membership in accordance with Articles 7 and 13-2 of the Articles of Association of the Korean Sports Council. Revised on March 23, 2017, October 6, 2021. ② Member sport organizations shall determine a name that reflects the representativeness of the sport in question and shall be called ○○○○ Association (association or federation), and its English name shall be determined separately. . Revised 2021. 10. 6.
